data: The Ortl’er is the Mont Blanc of the Tyrol, and seen from Nauders, a village on a green, grassy table land, more than four thousand feet above the sea, can well bear comparison with the boldest of the Swiss Alps.
Ortl’er | Mont Blanc | Tyrol | Nauders | Swiss Alps
